overview: Updated for Phase 2 post-MVP. Focus: Detail views, data enrichment, member dir. Reference new /data JSONs. Update scores dynamically.

tasks.name: Initialize Repository Structure
tasks.description: Create the core folder structure mirroring the Moneta agent setup. Ensure compatibility with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind.

subtasks.action: Create root folders: /system, /task, /SOPs, /skills, /workflows, /data (for initial datasets), /src (frontend), /docs.
Set up GitHub repo with .gitignore for Next.js (node_modules, .env, etc.). Initialize with README.md based on Moneta template, updating for Intersect Mirror.
Configure package.json with dependencies: next@15, react@19, typescript, tailwindcss, recharts, react-force-graph, supabase/supabase-js.

tasks.output: Updated repo structure committed to main.

tasks.name: Define Data Model & Database Schema
tasks.description: Create a simple schema for transparency data, budgets, and network nodes. Use Supabase for quick setup.

subtasks.action: Draft database-schema.md in /system: Tables for budgets (category, amount, transparency_level), people (name, role, affiliations), relationships (from_entity, to_entity, type). Include JSON fields for metadata.
Set up Supabase project (free tier). Create tables via SQL or dashboard: budgets, people, relationships, transparency_scores. Add indexes on category/role.
Create TypeScript interfaces in /src/types: e.g., interface Budget { category: string; adaAmount: number; status: 'verified' | 'partial' | 'missing'; }.

tasks.output: Schema file + Supabase project URL (add to .env.example).

tasks.name: Collect & Structure Initial Data
tasks.description: Manually populate seed data from PRD sources (budget proposal, Google Sheet). Focus on 2025 budget and basic network nodes.

subtasks.action: Download/parse Google Sheet into CSV/JSON. Extract categories, amounts (~180M ADA).
Hardcode initial people/network data: e.g., Jack Briggs (Exec Dir), committee chairs. Add affiliations (IOG, Emurgo, CF). Sources: Intersect docs, LinkedIn/X searches.
Seed Supabase with data. Calculate initial transparency scores (e.g., Budget Flow: 70% based on on-chain visibility).

tasks.output: Seed scripts + JSON files committed. Initial score: ~60%.

tasks.name: Build Hero Dashboard - Transparency Meter
tasks.description: Create the eye-catcher: Radial gauge for overall score + segmented bars for categories. Pull from Supabase.

subtasks.action: Design component in /src/components/TransparencyMeter.tsx: Use Recharts RadialBarChart for score, BarChart for breakdowns (weights from PRD).
Integrate Supabase query: Fetch scores, display 'Data Points: X/Y'. Add CTA button: 'Contribute Data' (links to form placeholder).
Style with Tailwind: Dark mode default, responsive (mobile-first). Add animation for score load.

tasks.output: Live component on /pages/index.tsx. Test: npm run dev.

tasks.name: Implement 2025 Budget Overview with Sankey Diagram
tasks.description: Visualize flow: Total ₳263M, breakdowns. Use Recharts Sankey for money paths.

subtasks.action: Create /src/components/BudgetSankey.tsx: Nodes for Treasury/CDH/Committees, links with ADA values from seed data.
Add table below: Category | Amount | Status (color-coded). Fetch from Supabase, export CSV button.
Page: /pages/budget.tsx. Include discrepancy note (180M vs 263M) with source links.

tasks.name: Build Network & Influence Graph
tasks.description: Force-directed graph for people/org connections. Highlight IOG/Emurgo/CF overlaps.

subtasks.action: Use react-force-graph in /src/components/InfluenceGraph.tsx: Nodes (people/orgs), edges (roles/affiliations) from /data/network-nodes.json.
Add tooltips: Click node → Show bio/role. Color-code: Intersect (blue), Founders (red).
Page: /pages/network.tsx. Note: 'Neutrality Check: Track overlapping influence.'

tasks.name: Create Transparency Table
tasks.description: Overview table: Category | Status | Level | Updated | Source | Notes. Color-coded rows.

subtasks.action: /src/components/TransparencyTable.tsx: Use React Table or simple . Fetch all categories from DB.
Add filters: By category/score. Red/Yellow/Green badges.
Integrate into /pages/dashboard.tsx (under Hero).

tasks.name: Add About/Methodology Page
tasks.description: Static page explaining PRD, sources, neutrality. Include Intersect values quote + gaps.

subtasks.action: Create /pages/about.tsx: MDX for content from PRD sections 1-4,9. Embed sources as links.
Add footer nav: Home | Budget | Network | About.

tasks.name: Testing & QA
tasks.description: Unit/integration tests for components. Manual review for professionalism.

subtasks.action: Add Jest/RTL tests: e.g., render TransparencyMeter, assert score display.
Manual QA: Mobile resp, dark mode, data updates trigger re-render.

tasks.output: Test coverage >80%. Bug report if any.

tasks.name: Deploy to Vercel
tasks.description: Connect GitHub, set env vars (Supabase keys). Custom domain later.

subtasks.action: npm run build && npm run export (if static). Deploy via Vercel CLI.
Add analytics (optional: Vercel Analytics). Monitor for errors.

tasks.notes: Deployment handled via Vercel GitHub integration; auto-deploy on push.

tasks.name: Community Submission Form
tasks.description: Form for data tips (e.g., salary leaks). Verify via email/wallet sig.

subtasks.action: Build /src/components/SubmitDataForm.tsx with React Hook Form.

tasks.name: Transparency Breakdown Detail View
tasks.description: Drill-down pages for Meter categories. Show sub-points, evidence, gaps.

subtasks.action: Create /src/components/TransparencyDetail.tsx: Mini-pie chart (Recharts), evidence table (Category Sub-Item | Status | Source | Notes).
Add routing: /pages/transparency/[category].tsx. Fetch category data from Supabase; render gaps as red badges.
Integrate CTA: Link to submission form. Update Meter bars to be clickable (use Next Link).
Test: Add RTL tests for drill-down render.

tasks.output: Detail views live; e.g., /transparency/people-compensation shows roles/gaps.

tasks.name: Verification Workflow Tags
tasks.description: Add 'Verified by Community' badges; admin moderation placeholder.

subtasks.action: Update DB schema: Add 'verifiedBy' field to tables.

tasks.name: Member Directory + Paid Positions
tasks.description: Searchable list from new data; flag pay gaps.

subtasks.action: Seed new people/committees from /data/network-nodes.json to Supabase.
/pages/members.tsx: Table with search/filter; red badge for 'Salary: Missing'.

tasks.name: Historical Budget Comparison
tasks.description: Add 2025 vs. 2026 tab in Budget page; pull from reports.

subtasks.action: Fetch 2026 data (e.g., from Intersect updates); add to DB.
Import /data/network-nodes.json to Supabase (people/relationships tables).
Recalculate scores: e.g., People=50% with new verified roles.
Update Influence Graph: Add new nodes/edges; tooltips with sources.

global_notes: Prioritize facts: Use sources in tooltips/tables.
Monitor: Add Vercel Analytics for success metrics.
All commits: Use conventional format (feat:, fix:, docs:).
Data Sensitivity: No real secrets; flag gaps as 'missing' without speculation.
